nodes.text: The Minos Cluster was a star cluster within the Galactic Empire. During the time of Zare Leonis's attendance at the Empire's officers academy on the planet Arkanis, this cluster was having much trouble with smugglers and crime rings. Colonel Julyan lectured students in his Strategy and Tactics class regarding events in this sector. Thanks to the class-three intel/courier clearance granted to them, cadets at the academy could access real-time data on the Empire's activities in the cluster in regards to fleet movements, informants' tips, arrest records and more. Leonis, who was secretly only attending the academy with the intention of rescuing his sister, nevertheless found the information fascinating.

The Minos Cluster was first mentioned in Galaxy Guide 6: Tramp Freighters, though was not actually featured as part of story material until the article "Pergitor Coup Leaves Thousands Dead," which was part of Vol. 531 46 of the now-defunct HoloNet News. While this and other past sources referencing the Minos Cluster are now part of the continuity of Star Wars Legends, the Minos Cluster was mentioned in passing as a haven for criminal activities in Jason Fry's 2015 novel Servants of the Empire: The Secret Academy.
